Comments
June 19, 2022
Maxphyte
I tend to look down on any clix with dedicated pulse wave clicks if they are more than 90 points now. Just not worth it to pulse wave at all unless you’re a cheap tertiary figure now. The game’s action economy is not forgiving enough anymore to have even a secondary attacker waste an action for pulse wave.
June 11, 2022
gambitrmp
I still think those pulse wave clix look ok. Becomes a PC helper. Wouldn't want to crit miss with him but he'd still have staying power if you did.
May 31, 2022
Bobcat2022
I guess it's nice to have this line for Constructed when I'm trying to make a screen-accurate team of that finale episode. One good hit, or a single click of Mystics feedback, and he's pretty well done for, though. Extra glass, less of a cannon. EDIT: wait, no, Invincible soaks Mystics now! My bad, never mind, he rocks.
